Class MazeContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • generation.MazeContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MazeConfiguration

    public class MazeContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements MazeConfiguration
    Class encapsulates access to all information that constitutes a maze.
    Author:
    pk

        Tells if at position (x,y) and looking into given direction faces a wall.
        Specified by:
        hasWall in interface MazeConfiguration
        Parameters:
        x - is on the horizontal axis, 0 <= x < width
        y - is on the vertical axis, 0 <= y < height
        dir - is the direction in terms of North, East, South, West
        Returns:
        true if there is a wall, false otherwise
